1.content:
It was just an ordinary day as you awoke. This feeling did not last long as you quickly discovered that you were now about three inches tall and shrunk out of your clothes. Fear swept over you as you realized the severity of the situation. You had to find someone to help you quickly before the unthinkable occurred. You slowly crawled down the side of the bed and eventually reached the floor. Everything was huge to you, this would be quite an adventure there was no doubt about that. You had always had a fantasy about being in a similar situation but you never thought you would have to live it out. This was real life.

As you reached ground level you knew that there was no use staying in your room. So you headed towards the door in search of someone to help you. You have no idea how they will react to seeing you at this size but it is your only choice. Now at the door, you must decide where you are heading. There would probably be people in the kitchen, as well as the living room. However, Tiffany and Melissa could still be asleep. Eventually you made your choice and headed out.

Where did you go?
1.title: That Shrinking Feeling

choices: Try to climb the nightstand to be seen
11.content:
You decide the best choice is to go seek Tiffany's help. You figure she'd know what to do to help you. As you make your way to her room you hear whistling coming from Tiffany's room and realized that today was cleaning day which meant Jane was over. As you came to the entrance of the room, you saw that Tiffany was still asleep, and Jane was dusting. Her beautiful body slowly swaying back and forth to the music from her CD player. This presented you with a whole new opportunity. You had always had a crush on Jane and figured she would be willing to protect you. Though, the last time she was over, you did yell at her for loosing your shirt. She could still be mad at you. Just then, you realized that you couldn't just stand there all day. You needed to be found.

What do you do to be found?
11.title: Sleeping Beauty

choices: Yes. She realizes what she has
No. She places you in her car
114.content:
You figured your best bet was to hide in Jane's cleaning bucket and eventually she would see you. As you made your way over to the bucket you realized it was a lot bigger than you thought. Never the less, you began climbing. As you approached the top, Jane picked up the bucket, the sudden shift threw you into the bucket. There was no way to escape so you decided to just stay calm. A couple of hours later, you realized that Jane was getting ready to leave. As she reached her hand into the bucket to retrieve her supplies, the bucket belong to your family, you decided to let her grab you. As she lifted you out of the bucket, she stopped for a moment.

Did you notice you?
114.title: Mr. Clean

1142.content:
Without even noticing you, Jane continued to put the cleaning supplies in her car, and then head home. She lived in a small home and normally watched over her two nieces. The two girls were twins of 19 years old. They both had blonde hair, green eyes, athletic builds, great busts, but different personalities. Caroline was more motherly and tender, while Grace was more social and wrapped up in the equal rights scene. You had seen them once or twice but never really spent much time with them. Until now, that is. You had always thought Caroline had a thing for you. You wouldn't mind being her little pet. Grace had always scared you, who knows what horrors she would expose you to. As Jane put the cleaning supplies inside, you let go of the bottle and landed safely on the table. You looked around and realized the strangeness you were now presented with. Suddenly, a hand came down upon you without warning.

Who had grabbed you?
1142.title: Home Is Where the Sam Is

11421.content:
You found out that it was Caroline who had grabbed you. Without anyone noticing, Caroline took you back to her room. "You look so scared, little guy, but don't worry. I am going to take care of you from now on. You can call me "Mommy" and we are going to have so much fun." You thought this could work out really well for you and did not complain. Caroline then began to cuddle you and love you. "You must be hungry. I will go get you something to eat. Stay right here." Caroline set you down and left the room. It was a good fifteen minutes until Caroline returned with food. She had brought you a cupcake. "Here you go. Enjoy!" Caroline said as she watched you endearingly as you enjoyed the gigantic cupcake. Just then, the door to the room opened. It was Grace. She had come to the room looking for her phone. However, you thought she saw you.

Did Grace see you?
11421.title: Playing Mommy

choices: The bags in the back seat
12.content:
As you began your trip to Melissa's room, you suddenly became aware that the ground was shaking. You looked up to see that Melissa was running down the hall. She was late for work and was quickly trying to leave. As she ran past you, you grabbed onto her jean leg and began to climb. It was hard to grip the denim but you held on as Melissa got into the car. You were just about to grab onto her white blouse just as the air conditioning started up even before she shut the door. You were caught off guard and was lifted into the air. You tried to direct your fall but to little avail. You looked down to see where you were going to land. You braced yourself for impact and hoped for the best.

Where were you landing?
12.title: A Little Detour

choices: Go search the mall for help
Try to find a store employee
Hitch a ride on the next customer
122.content:
Eventually you land and find yourself in one of the department store bags that Melissa had in the back seat. You remember her saying something about returning some clothes to the mall. You figured this is what she meant. You tried to get out of the bag but it was impossible. Instead, you decided to take a little nap. A few hours later you awoke to find yourself on the floor of the department store. Melissa had returned the clothes and you had slept through it. now you were lost in a giant department store which was attached to an even larger mall. Things couldn't get much worse for you at this point.

What do you decide to do?
122.title: A Small Errand To Run

1221.content:
You figured that there had to be someone in the mall that would help you. You left the department store, while coming very close to death multiple times, and finally made your way to the actual mall. You had been to this mall numerous times but never at this size. You knew the area very well. There was the food court, the various stores, the kiosks, and the built in restaurant. You knew a lot of friends from college that worked in the mall. You knew someone would be willing to help you. The problem was, where were you going to look for help. You were only so big and the mall was a huge place to you. You needed to make up your mind. You knew a blonde haired female who worked at the food court since high school. She seemed to have liked you. However, you know that Kelly's best friend worked at the Victoria's secret. She would probably help you but not for certain. You were also kind of hungry, so you kind of wanted to stop by the restaurant.

Where did you go for help?
1221.title: Mega Mall

choices: Attempt to climb the slippery slop of the cup's side.
Get to the side and wait it out. Maybe you can get her attention.
Melissa reaches her destination, taking a spoonful of yogurt.
123.content:
Finding yourself in an inevitable, directionless free-fall, you glance around wildy as you body descends into the unknown. Your downward velocity was about that of a small rock, and with the wind tugging at your body as you dropped it feels the part. You had since given up on trying to maneuver, and your understanding of gravity makes you realize that where you land is entirely up to chance. Finally, you do land, yet earlier than you hoped. The first thing you notice is that you're not dead or in multiple pieces, which is good news. The sensation of landing in something that was not entirely solid hits you, and a brief imursion in what could only be described as swamp-like befalls you. Upon opening your eyes which were forced shut by the speed of your descent, you quickly find out what your situation is as you bop to the surface.

You were in Melissa's yogurt cup, covered in the lactic goo. Not too bad in terms of a soft landing, and you weren't complaining. As you start wading through it toward the side of the cup, you feel the expected jostling of your container in Melissa's left hand. This is was probably due to the car's movement out of the drieway. You crane your neck upward, and using the woman's mountainous breasts directly overhead as a landmark, realized you were being held at about chest-level. Melissa's other hand, just out of your span of view, rested on the car steering wheel, as she hummed softly to herself (loud enough in your ears to be the distinct tune of a song you recognized) while driving. Now that you knew you weren't in immediate danger, you had to begin planning. There was no way you could stay in this yogurt... there was no telling when she'd decide to eat from or discard it.
123.title: Better But Wetter

choices: You survive, but are caught up in Melissa's toes as she passes.
Her foot slams down just beside you, sending you tumbling off the porch.
You meet a hapless end under the crushing weight of Melissa's sole.
124.content:
From what you could see of the distorted world around you, it was clear it would not be in the house. With the blast of air that had knocked you off of Melissa's waist having thwarted your efforts at getting to higher ground, as it were, there was no telling where you would finally come to a stop. Hopefully the surface was malleable enough to permit survival... otherwise a red blotch would be all that remained as a testament of your misfortune. Upon hitting the ground, you realize that your prediction was correct: you had landed outside, through the door Melissa had just opened seconds beforehand.

You find yourself on the forgiving ground of your house's door mat, with the enormous staccato lettering of "WELCOME" plastered across it. You landed in a sitting up position, virtually unharmed save for some shoot pains in your wrists -- a consequence of trying to break your fall out of pure reflex. Your addled vision cleared at last, you find a much more startling view in your sight now. You had fallen ahead of your older sister, and your current location was right in her path; and you realize in fright that in a matter of seconds her thunderous footfalls would become footsteps.

Not looking forward to becoming two-dimensional so easily, you jolt up to stand, with life-saving adrenaline surging through your veins. The flip-flop clad foot of your towering, redhead sister hovers above you, the encompassing shadow of it dwarfing you in its radius. But you don't let the hopeless sight deter you as your legs are forced into motion, and you make a desperate dive roll to avoid being crushed by those enormous feet. The sound of the door shutting (defening in your ears) forms the backdrop as you brace for impact, hoping that your last minute grope for survival would be enough.
124.title: The Great Outdoors

choices: She was still angry at you
She was over the whole thing
1241.content:
You do survive but now you find yourself heading wherever Melissa was going. As she walked down the street you realized she was headed to the grocery store. You remember her saying that she would have to get some groceries. You decided to tag along and as she entered the grocery store you freed yourself. You know found yourself alone in the grocery store. You decided to head over to the bakery section as you remembered that your ex-girlfriend was the sandwich chef. Her name was Kelly and she had jet black hair, green eyes, and a great personality with a body to match. You use to go to work with her and watch as she made all different types and kinds of sandwiches that the grocery store would then either package and sell or sell fresh. You were especially fond of her vegetarian sub, and pressed lettuce, tomato, and cheese sandwich. Eventually you made it to the bakery section. You then started the long climb up the counter. Even though you broke up with Kelly to date Nora you figured she would still help you. Before too long, you reached the counter and found yourself staring at the beauty that was Kelly. She saw you and grabbed you right away. "Why hello Sam," she said with a grin, "it appears you need my help." You confirmed this assumption. "I figured." she said, "You remember how we broke up?" You gulped as you saw where this was headed.

Was Kelly still bitter?
1241.title: Grocery Run

choices: Kelly would eat you during her lunch break
You would become Kelly's pet/servant for your life
12411.content:
"I can't tell you how mad I still am at you, Sam!" Kelly said. You knew you were now in serious trouble. You tried to apologize for your past actions but she wasn't listening. "Looks like I can get back at you once and for all." Kelly said with a grin. You had a good idea what she had planned but you weren't sure. You begged for your life but Kelly just laughed as she stuffed you in her cleavage while she told you she would think about revenge. You couldn't believe what kind of trouble you were in. It was a few hours later but eventually Kelly grabbed you and told you she had decided how to get back at you for the pain you caused her. You knew you were dead and though you broke up with her you began feeling yourself drawn to this beauty once again. It was weird but you were kind of turned on at the idea of your ex deciding your fate.

What did Kelly decide?
12411.title: Revenge Is A Dish Best Served

124111.content: I've decided, I'm going to swallow you, you're going to become part of my body, maybe fat, I need to gain a few pounds, ahahah. You shout: Kelly Noo! Kelly throws you in her mouth and decides.
124111.title: Kelly would eat you during her lunch break

13.content:
You decided that your best bet would be going to the kitchen to find somebody. You were hungry anyways. As you enter the kitchen after the long trek you see Susan is preparing breakfast for Tiffany, Melissa, Jane, and Nora. Nora must have come over looking for you. You can't believe your luck. Everyone who would be willing to help you is here. You can't decide who to go to to ask for help when suddenly, Susan walks past you. The breeze lifts you into the air and drops you right on top a the stack of pancakes. You are trapped by the syrup and are at the mercy of the others, as Susan carries the stack of pancakes to the table. By the time everyone gets their share you are on someone's plate.

Whose plate are you on?
13.title: Someone's In The Kitchen

choices: She picks you out. You won't be sister food this time; she has other plans....
She smiles and guides her fork towards you. She wants her brother for breakfast.
Nora saw you as well. She wants to trade plates with Tiffany....
131.content:
In the commotion of the girls grabbing their share of pancakes, you were somehow unseen, and got trapped between two gooey syrup covered pancakes that were on top of another one. You were pinned with only your hands, arms, and head sticking out, which wasn't enough to free yourself. You were facing the wrong way to see who's plate you were on, but you cringed as you heard a couple clinks against the plate, which you took as the sound of whoever's fork hitting the plate as she carved out a part of the pancake behind you. A second after you heard those sounds, one of the other girls while reaching past the plate for some bacon from a basket, bumped the plate, turning it just enough so that you could turn your head to the left and look up to see who's plate you were on. You were just in time to see your younger sister, Tiffany, wolf down a large three-layered section of pancake. She chewed thoroughly and you watched her neck bulge a little as she swallowed.
         You were panicked, but confident that she would see you, because at three inches, you weren't exactly invisible, especially to someone that would be looking down many times at the plate you were on. You figured that once she got to your section of her breakfast she would have to see you; you just hoped you didn't get a fork in your back before she noticed. One problem was that you weren't sure on how your sister would react to having you on her breakfast plate; she did have a strange personality and she also loved to eat all the time, though some how always stayed in shape. You didn't think she would intentionally eat you. Your confidence in your sister was weakened as she remarked a few seconds after swallowing that first bite, "Mmm, these pancakes are so yummy. I'm so hungry this morning, I might eat anything that ends up on my plate."
         What she said, increased your fear that this situation would be ending with you becoming a part of your sister's balanced breakfast. Looking up at her, you frantically waved your arms around. To your happy amazement, when she looked down to get ready to cut out her second bite, she gasped almost silently as she saw you. Her mouth stayed open slightly; she didn't say a word. You were happy because you thought that this meant that she was going to free you and get you help, but the longer she sat thinking, you wondered if you were safe in her care.

What happens next?
131.title: Breakfast With Tiffany

1311.content:
While being very discreet, Tiffany picked you out of her food and stealthily hid you in the waist of her shorts. You were so glad she saw you. However, you became aware of the fact that before Tiffany hid you, you could see her mouth the word "later" to you. She was probably going to eat you later, you had to find a way to escape before that happened. As for now, you were trapped in between Tiffany's waistband and stomach area. A few moments later you could feel Tiffany get up from and table. You had heard her say something about going out for the day. You knew she had other plans for you, and you were scared. You could each step as Tiffany got into her car and began to head out for the day. Once she was in the car, she pulled you out of her waistband and licked you clean of the sticky syrup. "So, I see you've been shrunk, little bro." she said with a smirk, "I may have saved you at breakfast but don't think I'd do it again. But right now we are going to have fun all day. Just brother and sister time." You gulped as she mentioned her intentions. "Here's the problem," she began again, "I don't know where to go first. We could go to the mall, my friend, Karen's, house, or we could head out and enjoy the beach. It is your choice." You thought for a moment. You wanted to choose wherever gave you the best chance of escape and survival.

Where did you choose?
1311.title: Bonding Time

13113.content:
"Let's go to the beach." you said. Tiffany agreed and she headed to the beach. The beach was nearby so it didn't take long to get there. As Tiffany walked onto the beach, you found yourself quite comfortable in her cleavage. It was a very nice day and there were a good number of people on the beach. Just then, Tiffany recognized one of her friends in the distance. As she went over, you found it hard to keep a handle. It was not long before you found yourself no longer with Tiffany. You look around and see that there were some avenues of help nearby. You saw that there were two girls having a picnic nearby but there was also a snack shop not too far.

Where do you head for help?
13113.title: Fun In The Sun

131131.content:
You decided to make your way over to the picnic. As you got closer, you could make out that the girls looked to be about 22. They seemed to be having a great time as they were enjoying their picnic. As you got close enough you saw that they were eating a huge lunch. You tried to get their attention and before too long one of them noticed you. "What do we have here," the female said. She had a very tan complexion and it was obvious she was Latina, blue eyes, and a great body with long brown hair. You tried to explain your situation but she was not listening to you. Instead, she was busy talking to the other female. The other female was of Asian heritage, she had an athletic body, long black hair, and green eyes on a great face. You couldn't believe your luck, they both seemed very nice and you were attracted to both of them. However, your feelings changed as the Latina looked at you again. "Ok, little man. Here are your choices. You can either join our picnic or you can be our slave. Your choice." You contemplated both choices, you were hungry, and it was very nice of them to invite you to join their picnic but you wouldn't mind being their slave.

What was your choice?
131131.title: Joining the Picnic

1311311.content:
“I would love to join the picnic. That’s so nice of you.” You walked onto the standard red and white checkered blanket. “Alright then, we would love to have you for lunch, the Latina said, “Oh, how rude of me, my name is Naomi and this here is Helena.” You introduced yourself to the two kind women and then inquired as to what was for lunch. Helena rattled off the list of the contents in the basket. Everything sounded wonderful to you and asked if you could just have a salad wrap. Naomi began preparing the wrap, as she spread salad dressing on the tortilla you couldn’t help but realize that the tortilla was massive. Then she piled it with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, onion, and a dash a pepper and then proceeded to roll the wrap. Naomi placed the wrap in front of you and the size of it loomed over you. Naomi and Helena just stood back and admired you as you ate. It was a little unnerving but you didn’t think of it.
While you were eating, the two women were whispering to each other. You overheard Naomi mention how tasty you looked. This set off a flag and you tried run away. But before you could escape Helena’s hand grabbed you. “Were you just going to eat and run, little guy?” the Asian beauty asked. Before you could respond the two goddesses stuffed you in the picnic basket and then headed back into town. They were roommates in the city and now you were the prisoner. A half hour later, you found yourself on the kitchen counter of the apartment. All the picnic supplies was put away and nothing seemed out of the ordinary. There was no one around and the door was open, you could escape if you wanted but where would you go? It was a toss-up.
What did you do?
1311311.title: Picnic Panic

choices: Try to reason with them upon their return
13113112.content: You decide its best to hide. After all at this size, most likely running for the hallway would be a death sentence. At least here you could hide from your captures. You look around the area and see a TV in the distance, a window that has been slightly cracked open, and on the counter a piece of bread lying there. "Think Samuel." You say to yourself. The window is a very viable escape route if the fall was possible to survive. But, that would mean braving the outside and already your sister, Naomi, and Helena have wanted to eat you. Perhaps, hiding is not the answer. Maybe you stay here and reason with the two.
13113112.title: Apartment Prison

choices: Naomi: "Worthy enough to eat I say."
Helena: "Worthy enough to be my slave."
131131122.content:
After waiting two hours, you watch as both Naomi and Helena open the door and walk in. Both still in the bikinis they wore at the beach. "That party was great Naomi!" "I know! But all I can think about is that small guy we found. I really want to eat him *moans*." "Can we keep him around abit first. Imagine what he could do for us." "We left him on the counter right *turns toward the counter and smiles* yep Helena he is waiting for us!" You watch as the giant women walk toward you. You fall on your ass walking backwards away from them. "Seems like he heard our conversation Naomi haha." You stand up to speak with them. "Ladies, no,....Goddesses." you start off trying to gather their interest. "Ahhh." Both of them go. "I have a proposition you two gorgeous beings will be interested in. Both of you want me, one to eat me, the other for sexual desires; however, I am not worthy of such attention. With that said, bringing me back to my family would be the best for all of us."

The two begin whispering to each other giggling occasionally. Then,........... (Naomi) or (Helena) says.....
131131122.title: Conversing with Two Goddesses

choices: Helena watched, your friend swallow you alive.
Helena saves you, she wants you as a slave.
1311311221.content: Naomi says: Worthy for me to eat you, ahahah. She lifts you to her open mouth at this moment.
1311311221.title: Naomi: "Worthy enough to eat I say."

choices: in you go, to be chewed up. Tiffany thoroughly enjoys the best part of her meal.
Melissa grabs the fork. Older sis believes she deserves to get to devour you.
Jane grabs the fork to save you from being sister food....
1312.content:
You wondered what Tiffany could possibly be thinking about so long. From her actions, you got an answer that definitely wasn't in your best interest. You watched as Tiffany's slightly open mouth turned into a smile with her teeth showing, then her lips came together and her tongue came out and ran across her upper lip. With her deep green eyes staring hungrily at you, you knew that your lovely raven-haired sister had decided that you looked tasty and would be good breakfast food. She brought her fork down to slice out the section you were in. You still couldn't wiggle free; you winced as you closed your eyes, figuring that you would be skewered by her fork. To your amazement, her fork came through the pancake, but not you. It had just barely missed you, even so, you weren't safe. You were still trapped between two pieces of pancake on the fork, as she brought it up to her mouth. Being stabbed by the fork would have been painful if it had happened, but you knew that what was in store for you would be worse. Tiffany wasn't the type of girl that swallowed her food whole. You knew that she loved to savor her food as she chewed it, and she would savor you just as much as she crunched and munched you.
         Tiffany was obviously prolonging your agony of waiting for her to do the dead. She just stared at you thrashing about in between the pancake on her fork as she periodically licked her lips. She even took a few cute sniffs of you. Your sister, like she savored her food, was savoring the moment of having you on her fork like a normal bit of food about to feed her belly. You knew why she wasn't speaking or saying anything to you. She obviously didn't want anybody to notice you flailing on her fork. They might not look highly upon her devouring a member of the family. You knew Nora definitely wouldn't want her boyfriend to be chewed into pieces. Tiffany was done with the moment and was ready to eat you. You looked into her mouth as she opened wide, her eager tongue was salivating in anticipation, and you could see the darkness beyond. She moved the fork closer and closer and....

What happens next?
1312.title: Brother For Breakfast?

13121.content:
As the forked moved closer, you looked up into Tiffany's green eyes. She looked down and gave you sly little wink, which was basically her way of saying goodbye brother. After that you were shoved all the way into her gaping maw. Her mouth closed and you were encased in darkness. You felt as the fork was pulled out from under you and out of her mouth. You threw your arms around her undulating tongue. Survival wasn't an option at this point, unless your idea would work. You thought that maybe if you could survive being on her tongue long enough she would let you live. You held onto her tongue as tight as you could, as she chewed up the piece of pancake that had entered with you, while she was doing that, she did her best to shake you off her tongue. Since it was quite slick, it was hard to hold onto; the ring that you had made around her tongue with your hands holding together wasn't the tightest hold around her whole tongue, so almost constantly you were sliding back and forth along her warm and wet tongue. Though you were terrified about being devoured by your lovely sister, you couldn't help being turned on by the warm and wet massage feeling you were getting along the front of your body, you couldn't hold it and let loose some cream onto her tongue. You couldn't believe it, but she liked it and "Mmmmed" and "Aaahhed" at the extra flavor.
         Since it seemed like she wasn't going to get to chew you up because she couldn't get you free of her tongue, she decided to swallow the pancake and try and swallow you whole along with it. It almost worked. The suction created by her throat muscles swallowing the bits of pancake that tumbled past you, was very strong. You nearly lost your grip when your feet slid part way down her throat and it closed around them. The swallowing whole method didn't work so she pinned you tightly in between the roof of her mouth and her tongue and began sucking on your intensely. The full body sucking was actually so pleasurable that you accidentally let your grip with your hands loosen and you let go. Sensing it, she lowered tongue and quickly maneuvered you over to the left side of her mouth and down came her teeth, ending you. She munched and crunched on you thoroughly, savoring the moment that she won and her prize was making her brother just another part of her balanced breakfast.
         Tiffany moaned in satisfaction as she swallowed your chewed up body down to her belly. She moaned again as she licked her lips. Melissa turned to her and said, "What is with you Tiffany?" Tiffany just smiled at Melissa, took another bite of pancake and said through chewing it, "Oh nothing, it's just that these pancakes are incredibly tasty."
13121.title: Part Of Tiffany's Balanced Breakfast

choices: It isn't proper to swallow such a large mouthful of food, you are chewed up.
She wants to feel you squirm in her belly. Gulp! You go down alive and whole.
13122.content:
As you get closer to your imminent end by Tiffany, you take one last look around to see that everybody else had eaten quickly and left, except your older sister Melissa. Before you can be engulfed by Tiffany's mouth, you see that Melissa spotted what was going on. Her sparkling blue eyes were open wide with intrigue instead of expected surprise. She smiled like she had an idea, and it became clear quickly. Melissa reached over and grabbed the fork out of Tiffany's hands. "Hey! That's mine," Tiffany shouted, but not loud enough that others in the house could hear. You looked up at your new holder, your lovely older redheaded sister. Her plump red lips had more of an impact on her look compared to Tiffany's lips. Even though Melissa is your sister, you still loved the way she looked. She had a kind of plump, middle of the road, body style compared to her sister's athletic appearance. She also had a magnificent pair of D-cup breasts. You were hoping that she would take you off the fork, save, and help you. Though her actions were just as unpredictable as Tiffany's usually were.
         Melissa was a selfish person and just now, she showed her character by pointing out why she did what she did, though it didn't instill confidence in your situation on if you would survive this breakfast. She looked at you and giggled, "Tiffany, I know what you planned on doing to our cute 'little' brother. I agree, it is the perfect use for him. One problem, I am the older sister, I get first dibs on how to deal with our 'little' brother situation." She licked her lips while you renewed your wild wiggling, knowing that you escaped being food for one sister, only to switch to be food for the other. Tiffany stormed off in protest. Melissa smiled, "You're all alone with me now, with only one place to go. This should be an honor for you. I have seen the way you look at me, I'm your favorite sister, I'm easier on the eyes, having all the right curves. Well, this is where you get to become nourishment to improve the lovely body of your sister. I have nothing against you Sam, you have been a nice brother, but I can't pass up the chance to see what it is like to devour a scrumptious looking person like you."
         With that, she quickly and eagerly stuffed the fork full of you and pancake, all the way into her mouth, closing those fantastic plump red lips behind you. The fork came out clean. She rolled you around in her mouth to taste you. She liked your taste, giving many "Mmms" and "Aaahs". You situated yourself so that your head was facing the entrance to her mouth as you were trying not to slide backwards down her throat, by wrapping your arms around her tongue. This unintentionally helped further her love of your flavor, because it was hard to get a permanent hold on her tongue, so you slid back and forth on her slick, warm, and wet tongue, which you couldn't help be pleasured by it and her occasional sucking moments; this all ended with you depositing some of your cream on her tongue, to her liking. You had to admit that while you were scared about what was going to happen to you, the ordeal so far felt great. Though, it is a tight fit with all the pancake; some of it did end up falling back and getting swallowed. "Sis! You've had your fun, yes I taste great, but there is no need to eat me. I'll let you do this whenever you want if you don't eat me," You shouted, but your pleas fell on deaf ears, because Melissa was too into the moment to care about your life. You are hers now, her ideal breakfast. You know there are only two ways for this to end. You felt it would be more interesting to be swallowed whole and roam around in her belly as she went about her day, but being chewed up, while it would be painful, it would be quicker than slowly digesting alive.

How does Melissa deal with you?
13122.title: Different Sister, Same Situation.

135.content:
You look up to find that you had ended up on Susan's plate. You tried to get her attention but to no avail. all of the sudden you felt yourself being lifted into the air. Susan was going to eat you. You counted yourself dead, when Susan dropped her fork on the ground. The fall was enough to free you from the syrup. You avoided death but just barely. You decided your best bet would be to wait on the counter to get help. You figured someone would see you and you'd be safe. However, while you were waiting on the counter, the air conditioning had cut on. The sudden burst of air caught you off guard and blew you across the counter. You couldn't believe your bad luck. You looked behind you to see where you were headed.

Where were you going to end up?
135.title: Blowing In The Wind

choices: Yes. With a swift hand, she grabs you
No. You are alone in the college.
1353.content:
You look behind and notice you were heading straight for Susan's bagged lunch. She worked at the local college as a receptionist and had to go in even though it was summer. You try to slow yourself but before you can do anything, you are already in the bag. You gather yourself together and try to run out but before you can get up, Susan has already wrapped the top of the bag up and was leaving for work. You were trapped. The ride was long and bumpy but you found that by avoiding the apple and the water bottle you could survive the journey in one piece. A few hours passed, then light filled the bag as it was opened. You grabbed onto the apple as Susan poured the contents of the bag onto her desk. However, as the apple was pured onto the desk, it began to roll and land on the floor. You let go of the apple and try to make a run for it. As Susan leaned down to pick up the apple, you thought she saw you.

Did Susan spot you?
1353.title: An Apple A Day

13532.content:
You were now on your own as you head towards the main hall of the building. It was a small college, with only two class buildings, a library, and a cafeteria. There wouldn't be many people around but you expect there to be a good number of summer school students and professors. As you entered the main hall, you had no idea where to go next. You had never been faced with a situation like this and had no idea how to handle it. Then, a very professional looking woman walked by. You grabbed on to her shoe strap as she walked down the hall. She had brown hair, green eyes with glasses, a tall body and a nice bust. You figured she was a professor. As she entered one of the rooms and sat down, you were able to climb her with more ease. By the time you had reached her lap, she was at work at her laptop. You tried to climb higher but as she shifted her body you found yourself clinging for life. Your movements were enough to have the professor look down.

"Well, what do we have here?" she said as she lifted you up to her desk, "What happened to you, little guy?" You told her your story as she nodded, with a sly grin on her face. "That's very interesting. My name is Sarah." she said with a friendly attitude. You became more relaxed. She was quite interested in you and continued to ask you questions. After a barrage of questions, Sarah asked one last question,"Samuel, how would you like to be my pet?" You thought about the question for a while, she was a very beautiful woman and she seemed nice enough. You saw she was getting impatient so you answered her.

How did you respond?
13532.title: Teacher's Pet

135322.content:
You declined Sarah's offer and began to turn away. However, Sarah wasn't one to take lightly to rejection. "Well then," she said as she grabbed you, "If you won't be my pet, then you will just have to be my meal." And with those words Sarah placed you in between her cleavage and started to head over to the cafeteria. "You brought this upon yourself." she said as she entered the large room. There were several lunch lines, each one serving a different kind of food. You looked around and saw that there was a good number of the summer school students here as well. If you could get away, you might be able to hitch a ride on one of them. However, you had to first figure out a way to escape. "Well, my little morsel," Sarah said with a grin, "What are you hungry for today?" You examined the lines and tried to use foresight to figure out from which you could escape the easiest. "Well?" Sarah said impatiently.

What did you decide?
135322.title: Thanks But No Thanks

1353221.content:
Sarah got in the sandwich line and you watched in fear as she constructed a fiendish triple decker sandwich on white. "Oh on," Sarah said, "They're out of bacon. I guess I'll have to settle for a SLT. You gulped as she grabbed a handful of mayo, mustard, and ketchup packets. Sarah made her way to a table and removed the top half of the sandwich. "Get in." she ordered. She removed you from her cleavage and as you started heading towards the sandwich, you heard a new voice. "Professor Sarah!" a student was headed towards Sarah. She had red hair, green eyes, and a great body. You found a shimmer of hope and as the student approached the table. The student began talking with Sarah and as she did you became aware of a hand coming down over you.

Who did the hand belong to?
1353221.title: Student Relations

choices: Her teeth slice through. Crunch, munch, munch, you are lunch....
She doesn't bite all the way through; slurps you all in, you go down whole....
13532211.content:
The hand belonged to Sarah. She placed it over top of you, pinning you down on the tray. Obviously, you could tell that she was doing it to hide you; she didn't want anyone to know what she planned on having for lunch. You overheard the student explaining to Sarah that she needed an extension on a paper assignment. Sarah sighed, "Fine Melanie, you can have the extension on the paper. Now please leave, I would like to enjoy my lunch in peace before I have to be in class in half an hour. I expect you to be there; you can't miss another class, if you do I will have to drop you." "Thank you Professor Sarah," Melanie said, as you heard her walking away. Sarah's hand lifted and you saw her looking around to see if anybody else was around. There was nobody, even within hearing distance; the dining hall hardly ever got full enough for people to be sitting in the back corner. That is why Sarah chose the place to sit down for lunch.
         "Mmm, no interruptions now," Sarah said with a beautifully wicked smile, "Now, do as I commanded before, climb on into my sandwich." Reluctantly, seeing no other options, you climbed up onto the top middle of the triple decker sandwich and laid down in along the middle. The lettuce was like a cool bottom sheet on what would be an extremely dangerous bed. "Prefect, right like that," she said, wanting you to hold still, "A girl like me doesn't need ham on her sandwich when she's got Sam." You looked on as she laughed lightly an smiled as she tore open two ketchup packets, squirted some around the you, and then the last bit on you. She then placed the third piece of bread on top of you and smooshed it down. Of all the things you thought might happen today, you never expected that you would end up in the sandwich of a beauty like Sarah, bent on you being her lunch. She picked up the sandwich and brought it up to her face. Your head was slightly sticking out the front end. You look down to see her wonderful cleavage, then up to look into her mesmerizing green eyes which were focused on you, and finally, you looked forward at her lovely plump red lips, just in time to see her tongue sexily slide across her lips in anticipation of the meal you are going to become. Even though you were scared, you couldn't help be turned on by the thought of feeding her.
         "Well little morsel," Sarah said, "Enjoy the view while I devour you." You cringed as you saw her mouth come forward, but as you heard the deafening crunch, you realized that she was starting with the parts you weren't in first. You watched as she slowly chewed and then swallowed, seeing the lump travel down her gullet. You knew that you would soon be making that trip, whether you would be in one piece for the journey, you didn't know. She took another bite; this time she took it out of the other corner next to you. After she swallowed, she looked at you, smiled, and her mouth opened. In you went, engulfed by her hungry maw, her damp but sweet breath washed over you. You figured she was prolonging the bite down to toy with you. It didn't last for long, as all the light disappeared as her mouth came down around the whole part of the sandwich that your top half was in.

What happened next? Did you get chewed or swallowed?
13532211.title: Sarah's Lunch

135322111.content:
Crrrruuunnnch! It all went dark for you as were bit in half by Sarah and started to get chewed to bits. She savored the bite, munching and moaning until she finally swallowed it a minute later. "Mmm, scrumptious," Sarah said as she licked her lips to get a bit that had stuck to them. It didn't take long for her to savor the rest of the sandwich to finish her lunch. She let out a cute little burp and rubbed her belly, "That was the best sandwich I have had in a long time. I wish I knew how the little morsel shrunk; I wouldn't mind getting to eat other people." She got up and put up her tray, then went to her class. She decided to give her students a pop-quiz. The whole time her stomach churned her special lunch and she really started to feel energized. She normally finished a teaching day tired and rundown, but today she finished feeling like she could do anything. She got home and finished a few career advancing projects she had been putting off, and went to bed late. She got up the next day feeling more rested than ever before. While getting ready for another day of teaching, she noticed that her skin felt and looked smoother and like she was five years younger. She also noticed that her ass looked rounder and more shapely than before, so she wore a tight pair of dress pants to class and loved the attention she was getting from the male students, and even some of the female students.
         Sarah came to the conclusion that eating you had had a profound effect of anti-aging and bodily development. For weeks, she was on the look out for more shrunken people; she wonder if the effects would build up, because she definitely loved looking like she was in her early twenties. Then one fateful school day, she walked into her office after having gone to check her mailbox and noticed a pile of girl's clothing on the floor. She then felt a little prick on her foot and looked down. There next to her foot was a three inch tall redheaded girl jumping up and down, waving up to her. She bent over, picked up the little girl, and brought her up to face level. It turned out to be one of Sarah's problem students, the busty and beautiful Melanie, the one who pestered her a few weeks ago for a paper extension, almost ruining her lunch with you. "Help, help Professor Sarah," Melanie shouted, "I don't know what happened!" "A wish come true," Sarah said licking her lips, "You are just in time for my lunch."
135322111.title: Fuel For Sarah

choices: Sam turns into energy and sweat
135322112.content:
You are swallowed whole. Sarah licks her lips and delights wondering what the little sam would become in her body.
Sam heard a Gulp! And began to slip down, arriving in a lake of acid where his body began slowly to melt until they lost consciousness.
Sarah continued her day normally, feeling her body with extra energy.
135322112.title: She doesn't bite all the way through; slurp...

14.content:
You figure your best bet for discovery is in the living room. You head down the hallway and finally reach the outskirts of the room. As you approach you see that Susan is sitting on the couch reading the paper while Tiffany is frantically getting ready for work. She had just gotten a job at the grocery store and was running late on her first day. You look around some more, and see one of Melissa's friends. She had black hair, blue eyes, a great body, and looked to be around 21. "She must be waiting on Melissa to get ready." you thought to yourself. You realized that standing around wasn't going to help you so you decided on who to approach.

Who are you going to approach?
14.title: Small Talk

143.content:
You figured your best chance was with Melissa's friend. As you headed over to her, you saw that Melissa had entered the living room. Before you could reach her, the friend, whose name you found out to be Kelly, got up and headed towards the door. As she passed by you, you grabbed a hold of her sock and started to climb her long legs. While Kelly and Melissa were in the car you over heard them mention what all they were going to do. Eventually you made it to Kelly's knee, but as you did, Kelly bent over and you ended up in her purse. You were so close to being found. You couldn't do anything about your position so you decided to sleep a bit. A short time later, you awoke. As you stuck your head out of the purse you were taken back by where you were.

Where were you?
143.title: A Friend In Need

15.content:
Before you can do anything, you are swiftly scooped up. A few seconds later you see that it was Jane who had grabbed you. "Hello there, Sam," Jane said,"It is time for me to exact my revenge on you." She was still upset with how you yelled at her last time she was over. You try to apologize but to no avail. "I am going to get my revenge and it will be sweet." she continued. You were terrified at what this could mean. Just then, you heard someone come down the hall. Jane tried to hide but you though that the other person saw you. It turned out that it was Nora, coming to hang out with you.

Did Nora see you?
15.title: Playing Right Into Her Hand

151.content:
To your joy, you could hear Nora ask Jane what she had just put away. Jane tried to brush her off, but Nora was stubborn. Eventually, Jane revealed you to Nora. You were so happy as Nora snatched you from Jane and embraced your tiny body. Nora quickly ran out of the house, and headed straight to her place. "Oh Sam, How did this happen?" Nora asked you on the way. You explained to her that you had no idea. "I am going to keep you safe." she said as you entered Nora's apartment. "You are really cute at this height." Nora commented as she changed into a pair of short shorts and a tank top . "Let's play a game." Nora suggested.

What game did Nora have in mind?
151.title: Saved by the Blonde

choices: Nora's Roommate. Nora left for work
1512.content:
"Let's play hide and seek!" Nora said. You agreed and as Nora began counting you tried to find a place to hide. You ran across the kitchen counter and looked around for a hiding spot. Nora was almost done counting and in a moment of panic you threw yourself in the wooden bread box, shut the door, and hid between two slice of white bread. The loaf looked no different. As you waited, you slowly became proud of your hiding spot. Nora continued to call out your name but you kept still, thinking she was trying to trick you. eventually you fell asleep between the comfortable slices of bread. A couple of hours later, the bread box door opened and two slices were removed. One slice on either side of you. You remained asleep as you were removed from your hiding place. As you still slept, you were unaware of the danger going all around you.

Who had removed you from your hiding spot?
1512.title: Such A Good Hider

15122.content:
Eventually, you awoke. As you did you were shocked to see a foreign face staring at you. You noticed you were now in a glass. "Look who woke up," the female said, "My name is Lilly, and I am hungry." With that, the blonde haired bombshell with the blue eyes walked over to the fridge and gathered ingredients for a salad sandwich. She returned to the workspace and began preparing the sandwich as she hummed. You tried to explain your situation and how you were Nora's boyfriend. Lilly seemed to ignore you as she spread mayonnaise on one slice of bread, mustard on the other slice, and then proceeded to place lettuce on the slice of bread. You frantically tried to explain yourself up until the moment Lilly grabbed you with her silky soft hand. "You're Nora's boyfriend, huh?" she asked. You nodded. "Well then, let's play a game. You answer this question right and I'll believe you, answer it wrong and I make you lunch," Lilly explained, "You ready?" You nodded. "Here is the question," Lilly said, "What is Nora's college major." You thought you knew the answer but you weren't positive. You knew it was either culinary arts or hotel management.

How did you answer?
15122.title: You Have Some Explaining To Do

152.content:
Without wasting time, Jane decides to hide you.
That's when Jane hides you inside.
152.title: No. Nora is oblivious

info.brief_description: What do you do when you find yourself three inches tall? Almost anything goes. GPs for add
info.description:
A few rules to begin with:

1. Only one tiny person. You
2. All New characters must be original
3. No more size change.
4. Only female interaction
5. Keep crush and unbirth to a minimum and no toilet stuff.
6. Be descriptive and please make additions at least 5 sentences.
7. New characters must be between 18-37 years old
8. No animals or insects
9. Please be accurate with quotation mark usage and grammar in general
10. Please don't use the default title, be creative or use something different
11. Please have fun!
-----------------------------------------------------
*Background*

Your name is Samuel Jacobs. You are at home during the summer of your first year at college. Your parents are away and you are staying with your two sisters. All is fine until one morning you find yourself three inches tall.

Tiffany has black hair, green eyes, an athletic body, a sly attitude and is 19 years old. If she found you shrunk you'd be in trouble.

Melissa is a red haired beauty with blue eyes, a good build, a selfish attitude, and is 24 years old. There is no telling how she'd handle a tiny person.

There are a few other people that need to be mentioned.

Nora: Your girlfriend from college. She is a tall beautiful 23 year old woman with dirty blonde hair, green eyes, a great body and a loving personality with a jealous side. She would probably keep you safe though that is not for certain.

Jane: The maid. 29 years old with a large bust, brown hair, blue eyes, and a possessive nature. You suspect she has a crush on you and you can't say you haven't considered it.

Susan: Your aunt. She may come over and visit. She has blonde hair, green eyes, an attractive build, and a deviant nature. She would be a problem for sure. She also has two children she raises alone. Kelly, age 20, and Erica, age 18.

That about covers it. Have fun, enjoy yourself, tell me what you think, and please add!
